messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Hello Everyone
messages.msgSnippet: ... logged in to search for some on-line support.  I find the amount of e-mails a bit daunting though and seem to be jumping on the computer all the time just
messages.messageBody:
>
> I live in Australia and unschool my three sons - aged 11, 8 and 6. I
logged in to search for some on-line support. I find the amount of e-mails
a bit daunting though and seem to be jumping on the computer all the time
just to check the mailbox. I will probably subscribe as the need arises and
unsubscribe as the mail gets overwhelming.

Or just set your preferences at Yahoo to no email, then jump onto the web
and read when you feel the need or have the time.
By the way . . . welcome!
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
saftety deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...

Julie

messages.subject: Re: Hello Everyone
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Susan, I just read the messages at the site without receiving the email. IMO, that would be daunting!  Just an idea for you. -Christy ... most people
messages.messageBody:
Hi Susan,

I just read the messages at the site without receiving the email.
IMO, that would be daunting! Just an idea for you.

-Christy

messages.subject: Hello Everyone
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all I have been lurking around her all week and didn t realise that most people introduce themselves before they start jumping. Sorry if you were wondering
messages.messageBody:
Hi all

I have been lurking around her all week and didn't realise that most people introduce themselves before they start jumping. Sorry if you were wondering where on earth I came from

I live in Australia and unschool my three sons - aged 11, 8 and 6. I logged in to search for some on-line support. I find the amount of e-mails a bit daunting though and seem to be jumping on the computer all the time just to check the mailbox. I will probably subscribe as the need arises and unsubscribe as the mail gets overwhelming.

Susan

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
Hi Olga!

thanks for replying. i am in kendall and would like it very much to
keep in touch.....learn together how this works! if you like,
contact me at the email addy above....this should be interesting!

nancy...

messages.messageBody:
Hi there,

I am in Broward and sound similar to you. I ahve a son turning 5 so
we are just starting our "offical" journey. I won't be able to
answer many of your questions but maybe we can figure some things out
together!

Olga :)

messages.subject: Hello Everyone
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone.......i am new to this board. i will be unschooling my five yr old.  actually we have been workin on it since she was 3.  i was just wondering if
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone.......i am new to this board.

i will be unschooling my five yr old. actually we have been workin
on it since she was 3. i was just wondering if there are any
unschoolers in the miami florida area that wouldnt mind emailing
me. id like to become a little more familiar with all the
formalitites. i dont know about anyone else here.....but trying to
read all those statues gives me a headache! please feel free to
email me....thanks!
